name: The Return (sarayangs)
description:
The Return is a fast-paced endless run where you play as the Devil coming back to Sant Feliu once and for all!

•    Use the power of the dragon’s burning breath!

•    Fly with the magpie’s spirit!

•    Protect yourself with fireworks!

How long can you survive?

CONTROLS:

  • W to jump
  • S to crouch
  • LEFT CLICK to shoot
  • Q and E to use abilities 

GAME MADE BY

Jose Ubaldo Grabusqui  

Joan Mesalles   

Arnau González 

Sara Yang
